[Urnox Breinth's Head](/urnoxBreinthsHead/) (upon death) |hands = Gauntlets of Discipline |weapon1 = Bronlar's Phalanx |internalname = CHA_CRE_Rathun_Fanatic_Bounty |guid = 8ceca18b-7c08-475e-b227-d00c596099ca }} '''Urnox Breinth''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background Urnox Breinth, a Rathun warlord, has been launching attacks on Neketaka's shipping lanes. He and his crew were last seen taking shelter on an island in the southern midpoint of Magran's Teeth. Killing him would earn a significant bounty. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [Bounty - Urnox the Rathun](/bountyUrnoxTheRathun/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [Bounty - Urnox the Rathun](/bountyUrnoxTheRathun/): He is the target of the bounty.
